item.title: A Short History of AI - How it began and why it exploded
item.description: I read a bunch of old papers and remembered fragments of the story, Turing’s imitation game, McCarthy’s Dartmouth proposal, ELIZA’s keyword tricks — and wanted to collect a readable timeline so my future self can quickly recall how AI evolved. Below I put the history in plain words, added technical notes where it helps, and suggested why each era mattered to what we see today.
